trans:
I'm really sorry, I don't take any pleasure in it. You're the last person I want to hurt or harm.
üò¢
I feel like we need to have an honest conversation, where we could both open üîì our heads and our hearts.
Like I said, it's not that I don't have feelings, because I do.
It's not that I don't like you, because I do, I like you a lot.
It's not that I don't love you, because I do, and a lot.
You have such a huge heart ‚ô•Ô∏è, you're sweet, and stubborn, but you don't wish harm on anyone. That's something real and amazing.
I just feel like we weren't aligned, and it was causing discomfort for both of us. I didn't want to risk continuing in an uncomfortable situation for us both.
